SELECT bno, title, contents, nickname, created_time, updated_time, deleted FROM(SELECT (@R := @R+1) AS RN, bno, title, contents, nickname, created_time, updated_time, deleted FROM(SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.contents, b.nickname, b.created_time, b.updated_time, b.deleted FROM board b
WHERE b.bno LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY b.bno, b.nickname
WHERE b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY b.bno, b.nickname
WHERE b.contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY b.bno, b.nickname
WHERE b.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY b.bno, b.nickname
WHERE b.bno LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b.contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY b.bno, b.nickname
ORDER BY b.bno desc) A, (SELECT @R:=0) AS X WHERE deleted = 1 LIMIT #{endNo})B WHERE RN >=#{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT bno, title, contents, nickname, deleted FROM board
WHERE bno LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY bno, nickname
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY bno, nickname
WHERE contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY bno, nickname
WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY bno, nickname
WHERE bno LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY bno, nickname
)A where deleted = 1
